name: T.E.S.T
description: Note: It’s my first Game Jam and my first game. All what I made is made by me and all was made during jam. Controls: Use mouse and click buttons (numbers) on the bottom of the screen. Description: It’s short, math puzzle game with time-rewinding in the theme. Game made using GDevelop and because of it, game is blurry and have stupid places for buttons, but to be honest it is only tool which is free and is easy enough to make this game by me.
